mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getProductOptions */ SELECT a.prod_id 'prodId' ,a.option_seq 'optionSeq' ,a.option_item 'optionItem' ,a.is_mandatory 'isMandatory' ,a.create_datetime 'createDatetime' ,a.modify_datetime 'modifyDatetime' ,a.creator 'creator' FROM product_option a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.prod_id = #{prodId} AND a.option_seq = #{optionSeq} AND UPPER(a.option_item) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{optionItem}), '%') AND UPPER(a.is_mandatory) = UPPER(#{isMandatory} AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) ORDER BY a.prod_id ASC, a.option_seq ASC, a.option_item ASC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}
/* QUERY ID : getNextProductOptionSeq */ SELECT CASE WHEN max(option_seq) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE (max(option_seq) + 1) END FROM product_option WHERE prod_id = #{prodId}
mapper.delete: /* QUERY ID : deleteProductOption */ DELETE FROM product_option WHERE prod_id = #{prodId} AND option_seq = #{optionSeq};
mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getProductOptionValues */ SELECT b.prod_id 'prodId' ,b.option_Item 'optionItem' ,b.is_mandatory 'isMandatory' ,a.option_seq 'optionSeq' ,a.value_seq 'valueSeq' ,a.value_label 'valueLabel' ,a.in_stock_cnt 'inStockCnt' ,a.unit_price 'unitPrice' ,a.extra_charge 'extraCharge' ,a.use_yn 'useYn' ,a.create_datetime 'createDatetime' ,a.modify_datetime 'modifyDatetime' ,a.creator 'creator' FROM product_option_value a LEFT OUTER JOIN product_option b ON b.prod_id = a.prod_id AND a.option_seq = b.option_seq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.prod_id = #{prodId} AND a.option_seq = #{optionSeq} AND a.value_seq = #{valueSeq} AND UPPER(a.value_label) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{valueLabel}), '%') AND UPPER(a.use_yn) = UPPER(#{useYn}) AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) ORDER BY a.prod_id ASC, b.option_seq ASC, a.option_seq ASC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}

/* QUERY ID : getNextProductOptionValueSeq */ SELECT CASE WHEN max(value_seq) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE (max(value_seq) + 1) END FROM product_option_value WHERE prod_id = #{prodId} AND option_seq = #{optionSeq}
mapper.update: /* QUERY ID : modifyProductOptionValueForNotNull */ UPDATE product_option_value SET modify_datetime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , value_label = TRIM(#{valueLabel}) , in_stock_cnt = TRIM(#{inStockCnt}) , unit_price = TRIM(#{unitPrice}) , extra_charge = TRIM(#{extraCharge}) , use_yn = TRIM(#{useYn}) WHERE prod_id = #{prodId} AND option_seq = #{optionSeq} AND option_value = #{optionValue}
